Sns.Message:
AWS Budget Notification July 03, 2025
AWS Account 565219270600

Dear AWS Customer,

You requested that we alert you when the ACTUAL Cost associated with your dmc-prd-daily-cost-budget budget is greater than $0.00 per day. Yesterday, the ACTUAL Cost associated with this budget is $5.32. You can find additional details below and by accessing the AWS Budgets dashboard [1].

Budget Name: dmc-prd-daily-cost-budget
Budget Type: Cost
Budgeted Amount: $0.00
Alert Type: ACTUAL
Alert Threshold: > $0.00
ACTUAL Amount: $5.32

[1] https://console.aws.amazon.com/billing/home#/budgets
Sns.Subject: AWS Budgets: dmc-prd-daily-cost-budget has exceeded your alert threshold
